string.c: Error message when new payment method type is not configured
string.val: This payment method type %type% is not allowed

string.c: PCC|New bank account form field title
string.val: Allow payment by this payment method

string.c: CP|New credit card form field title
string.val: Use this payment method for recurring payments
Refresh this page to update the status of your payment.

string.c: CP, RCC store message 3d secury redirect
string.val:
Please wait while we process your payment details.
If you are paying by credit card and you have registered for the 'Verified by Visa' or 'MasterCard SecureCode' scheme, then you will be redirected to your banks secure server where you will need to enter your security password/PIN.
If you have not registered for Verified by Visa or MasterCard SecureCode then you will be asked to register before continuing with this transaction.

string.c: CP, RCC store message 3d secury redirect
string.val: If you have any question regarding making payment please contact the %s% support team.
The transaction has been cancelled, because 3D secure validation is required from customer.

string.c: CP | My Account | Billing History | Store | Payment Options
string.val: Unfortunately, your payment request is unavailable. Please try to perform the payment from scratch
